post.body: i had a dream that we were back at that sushi place in Montana and i stabbed a criminal. lmao
thanks for the inspirational stuff!!!
my new twitter friend!!! Making any wicked awesome holiday cupcakes lately?
In fact, i was.. Receiving End lyrics lmao
your choke chain looks dope like a yon!!!!
when is Fearless Records going to decide that "Punk Goes... Country" is a good idea?
whatever happened to Bowling For Soup? Let's do it for Johnny!
fill in the blank and send me an "at" message. "I am happy when _______."
I hate the dreams where the serial killer is right behind me.
Snow (hey oh!)
where are the seeds to the money tree?
"They're playing Hellogoodbye. Oh wait, this is Chris Brown."
early tweet yo. Up to run errands/get money son
Southtown for a few beers. Someone buy my camera on Craigslist.
the Jabber Jaw Mobile commercial is the greatest commercial in St Louis Metro history!!!
Malcolm in the Middle or DEATH!!!
i hate the kids on Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader.
this little light of mine (i was told to let it shine)
forget my heart, it's gone to hell.
keep locked your jaws, i hope you choke on it. i feel so..
did we just back into a Hummer? Oh it's cool.. lmao.. drink til your lungs give out.
i don't normally hang out with vampires but you're cool!
if it don't say Taco Thug then imma cut ewe. Terror and me at Danny & Preston'z.. getting drank on.
wearing swim trunks today in honor of the 68 degree weather.
best twitter user ever = @weatherwatches
tornado watch the day after Christmas? What IS Saint Louis weather?!
it's 303PM and I'm slightly drunk.. what is my LIFE?!?!
all dressed up (and nowhere to go)
Eiffel 65 on the MetroLink. Last time I had fresh squeezed lemonade was on tour.. ah.
early start day after Christmas. Clayton then laundry. Anyone hangin' tonight?
nothing to do on Christmas, what a bore snore snore
Don't die wondering. It's a Kill Hannah Christmas complete with four tall cans and a pack of menthol Kool Kings.
who wants to hang out at my house on Christmas? I'll be alone and bored.
all i want for Christmas is to be on Wheel Of Fortune
best part of my day was making @kittybaby screen names. Got em for miles, try us.
I have the best dreams ever. SAVVIS Center turned into an open-air stadium and everyone was throwing their hats during the National Anthem.
What did you watch tonight, Johnny? The Jungle Book and Katt Williams The Pimp Chronicles, pt. I & II.
Bomb Schiller's Camera please. Slipknot keeps me sane, no stress no pain ho ho ho
thanks MetroBus for letting me off at the wrong stop in the pouring rain.. catching a cab now.
never mind, MINDLESS SELF INDULGANCE ftw
